description: This skill expands on the functionality of the Nim Skill. It adds the ability to display game information on a screen through the use of a Raspberry Pi. Doing so requires a Gmail account and a small amount of hardware setup. Instructions for setup are at bit.do/nimskill.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, start nim lights and open instructions
Tell nim lights to start over
name: Nim with Lights
shortDescription: Nim is a simple game played with piles of objects. The objective is to beat the other player by taking the last available object.
